dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6593 IH: Codifying SAVE Plan Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Goldman of New York (for himself, Ms. Jacobs, Ms. Norton, Ms. McCollum, Ms. Crockett, Mr. Khanna, and Ms. Bonamici) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To require that the regulations related to SAVE Plan shall have the force and effect of enacted law.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Codifying SAVE Plan Act.

The provisions of parts 682 and 685 of title 34, Code of Federal Regulations, (relating to the SAVE Plan), as amended by the final regulations published by the Department of Education in the Federal Register on July 10, 2023 (88 Fed. Reg. 43820), shall have the force and effect of enacted law.
